revised_title: Enhancing Transgene Expression in Germline and Somatic Cells
tldr: The authors describe two strategies to enhance the efficiency of transgene expression in animals and plants. First, they demonstrate the importance of introns for efficient expression. Second, they show that chromosomal position effects at the site of integration can be manipulated to improve expression. These findings can help improve the production of recombinant proteins in transgenic animals for biotechnological applications.
